meanings.sent1: The superjets soared through the sky with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: The airport displayed various superjets from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The superjets decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was a superjet, propelling her towards her dreams at full throttle.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the superjets was deafening as they took off into the horizon.

meanings.definition: A type of aircraft that is faster and more powerful than standard jets.
meanings.sent1: The military invested in superjets for their superior speed and strength.
meanings.sent2: Pilots trained rigorously to handle the controls of the advanced superjets.
meanings.sent3: The superjets were so fast that they left regular jets in the dust.
meanings.sent4: In the world of aviation, superjets were the kings of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the superjets made them stand out among other aircraft.

meanings.definition: A powerful and advanced jet engine.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic carefully inspected the superjets to ensure optimal performance.
meanings.sent2: The superjets' engines roared to life as they prepared for takeoff.
meanings.sent3: The superjets' engines were so strong, they could propel a plane at incredible speeds.
meanings.sent4: The superjets' engines were the heart of their incredible power and speed.
meanings.sent5: The superjets' engines hummed with energy, ready to propel the aircraft forward.
